snippet.title: Sugar Rush - Official Launch Trailer
snippet.description:
Enter the sweet world of Sugar Rush, an action packed top-down roguelike filled with sweets and treats to empower your journey. Test your skills by facing various fruit snacks, defeating them with color instead of damage. Find the best set of treats to survive as long as possible!

Check it out on Steam and wishlist today:
https://store.steampowered.com/app/3059270/Sugar_Rush/
